company_info.Company Description: Blue Star is a dominant player in Airline Ticketing, B2B Portal, Forex business and is one of the top Consolidators in India with a well defined organised structure and supported by qualified and experienced personnel.
company_info.Company Name: Blue Star Air Travel Services (I) Pvt. Ltd.

api_data.company_name: Blue Star Air Travel Services (I) Pvt. Ltd.

jd_information.description: Opening for B2B Travel Firm in Air Ticketing.IATA qualified & knowledge of all CRS (Amadeus /Abacus) as well as Issuance of LCC.Have to work with Online & Offline.Good communication skills (Verbal & Written).Knowledge of World Geography.Domain knowledge and expertise in Reservation, Ticket issuance, Creation of PNR, Re-issuance & Cancellation.Able to read fare rules & penalty.Self-correspondence is a must.
